definitions.description: A demand raised by a customer with an active Insurance Policy to recover in the event of a loss that is covered under their Policy.

constantValues: A demand raised by a customer with an active Insurance Policy to recover in the event of a loss that is covered under their Policy.

members.name: claimId
members.description: Unique identifier for entity instances.

members.name: createdOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was created.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was created.

members.name: modifiedOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was modified.

members.name: statecode
members.description: Status of the Claim

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statecode_display' is added to the 'Claim' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statecode'
supportingAttribute.name: statecode_display

members.name: statuscode
members.description: Reason for the status of the Claim

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statuscode_display' is added to the 'Claim' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statuscode'
supportingAttribute.name: statuscode_display

constantValues: Reason for the status of the Claim

members.name: importSequenceNumber
members.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

constantValues: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

members.name: overriddenCreatedOn
members.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

constantValues: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.name: timeZoneRuleVersionNumber
members.description: For internal use only.

members.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode
members.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

constantValues: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

members.name: name
members.description: Required name field.

members.name: amountadjustersubmitted
members.description: The amount that was submitted based on an adjuster's initial inspection.

constantValues: The amount that was submitted based on an adjuster's initial inspection.

members.name: amountadjustersubmitted_Base
members.description: Value of the amount adjuster submitted in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the amount adjuster submitted in base currency.

members.name: amountpaid
members.description: Total amount paid to the customer on the Claim.

constantValues: Total amount paid to the customer on the Claim.

members.name: amountpaid_Base
members.description: Value of the amount paid in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the amount paid in base currency.

members.name: amountrequested
members.description: The amount requested by the claimant.

constantValues: The amount requested by the claimant.

members.name: amountrequested_Base
members.description: Value of the amount requested in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the amount requested in base currency.

members.name: assessmentdate
members.description: The date on which the Claim was assessed by an adjuster.

constantValues: The date on which the Claim was assessed by an adjuster.

members.name: causeofloss
members.description: Reference to Cause of loss.

members.name: claimguideline
members.description: Free Form guidelines for Claim admin through the Claims process.

constantValues: Free Form guidelines for Claim admin through the Claims process.

members.name: claimnumber
members.description: Unique Claim number in the source system.

constantValues: Unique Claim number in the source system.

members.name: claimtype
members.description: The type of the Claim raised by the customer, for example accident, disaster, injury, loss, etc.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'claimtype_display' is added to the 'Claim' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'claimtype'
supportingAttribute.name: claimtype_display

constantValues: The type of the Claim raised by the customer, for example accident, disaster, injury, loss, etc.

members.name: coverage
members.description: Reference to Coverage.

members.name: dateofloss
members.description: Date on which the loss occurred.

constantValues: Date on which the loss occurred.

members.name: description
members.description: Description of the Claim.

members.name: firstnoticeoflossdate
members.description: Date on which first notice of loss was reported.

constantValues: Date on which first notice of loss was reported.

members.name: policy
members.description: The Insurance Policy to which the Claim is made against.

constantValues: The Insurance Policy to which the Claim is made against.

members.name: rejectionreason
members.description: The reason for the Claim being rejected by the Insurer.

constantValues: The reason for the Claim being rejected by the Insurer.

members.name: reportingchannel
members.description: The channel through which the first notice of loss was reported, for example phone, website, virtual Agent, mobile, etc.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'reportingchannel_display' is added to the 'Claim' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'reportingchannel'
supportingAttribute.name: reportingchannel_display

constantValues: The channel through which the first notice of loss was reported, for example phone, website, virtual Agent, mobile, etc.

members.name: resolveddate
members.description: The date on which the status of the Claim was marked resolved, with resolved state as approved, withdrawn, or rejected.

constantValues: The date on which the status of the Claim was marked resolved, with resolved state as approved, withdrawn, or rejected.

members.name: resolvedstate
members.description: The resolved state of the Claim, for example withdrawn, approved, rejected.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'resolvedstate_display' is added to the 'Claim' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'resolvedstate'
supportingAttribute.name: resolvedstate_display

constantValues: The resolved state of the Claim, for example withdrawn, approved, rejected.
